channel.title: Objects on Radical Passive
channel.description: Recent content in Objects on Radical Passive

item.title: Wooden armchair
item.description: Wooden armchair The wooden chair has a simple and organic shape. The main feature of this design is the combination of the natural wood frame and the wood-coloured leather. The dimensions are standard, making the chair suitable for rooms of different sizes. Available for order. Сolour can be changed upon request. Dimensions: 700х700х600 Material: dark caramel eco-leather and cherry wood

item.title: White candle holder
item.description: White candle holder We have a tradition of dedicating a candle holder to each client that we work with and giving it to them as a present at the end of the project. So, the object is designed with a particular person or couple in mind and can be placed in the interior that we designed for them. This white candle holder was designed for a couple living in With love to Alvar and Aino.

item.title: A pair of black candle holders
item.description: A pair of black candle holders We have a tradition of dedicating a candle holder to each client that we work with and giving it to them as a present at the end of the project. So, the object is designed with a particular person or couple in mind and can be placed in the interior that we designed for them. This pair of black candle holders was designed for a young couple living in Grey apartment.

item.title: Camille
item.description: Camille A big enveloping cloud. It’s bigger than a normal chair: its dimensions defy common standards. You don’t sit on this chair, you stay in it. Furthermore, sitting in the chair is just one of the possible poses. Its soft, rounded shape gives it a relaxed and stable character. The upholstery is made of white textured corduroy. The chair is inspired by the works of the French studio Pierre Augustin Rose and the Russian designer Olga Engel.

item.title: Auguste
item.description: Auguste The chair is on the border between a functional object and a sculpture. It was specifically designed to stand out in the interior. It has no backrest, making it more of a cushioned stool. The armrests flow smoothly from the shape of the seat. The solid base gives the entire structure stability. The distinctive shape is accentuated by the black velour upholstery. The chair is inspired by the works of the French studio Pierre Augustin Rose and the Russian designer Olga Engel.

item.title: Black candle holder
item.description: Black candle holder We have a tradition of dedicating a candle holder to each client that we work with and giving it to them as a present at the end of the project. So, the object is designed with a particular person or couple in mind and can be placed in the interior that we designed for them. This black candle holder was designed for a couple living in Melancholy space.

item.title: Steel frame armchair
item.description: Steel frame armchair The armchair is developed for a private space. Rigorous design, inspired by furniture of the Modernist era, is conveyed by the simplicity of form and the choice of materials. The frame is made of stainless steel, the seat is upholstered with a rough dark fabric. The design by Radical Passive was realised in collaboration with two Belarusian manufactures. Seen in Melancholy space. Available for order. Сolour can be changed upon request.

item.title: Wooden bench
item.description: Wooden bench The lightweight construction and compact size of the bench make it a convenient and practical piece of interior design. The intentionally primitive design is not an accent, but rather an addition to the interior. The uncomplicated light silhouette adds detail to the space while the wood adds materiality. Seen in Melancholy space. Available for order. Сolour can be changed upon request. Dimensions: 450x1000x450 Material: oak veneer Photographer: Lizaveta Kulenenok

item.title: One-piece curtain rod
item.description: One-piece curtain rod How to make an object as mundane as a curtain rod beautiful? Get rid of all the ornaments, strip it down to pure lines, make it a single welded metal structure. Seen in Melancholy space. Available for order. Сolour can be changed upon request. Dimensions: custom Material: painted black metal Photography: Lizaveta Kulenenok

item.title: Elemental bedside cabinet
item.description: Elemental bedside cabinet It is a pure geometric object. The inconspicuous drawers are opened by push. The volume is large enough to contain the bedtime necessities. This bedside table is made of solid oak, coated in wood stain. Our design inspiration: the black monolith from Kubrick’s Space Odyssey. Seen in Melancholy space. Available for order. Dimensions: 300х300х510 Material: oak Photography: Lizaveta Kulenenok
